actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the annual gift tax exclusion and to clarify the gift tax treatment of certain transfers for consumption.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the amount of the annual gift tax exclusion from $3,000 to $10,000. Excludes non-appreciable gifts to minor children (under age 21) and household members for consumption from the gift tax.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the annual gift tax exclusion and to clarify the gift tax treatment of certain transfers for consumption.
